translation.permissionDeniedError: Permission denied: Unable to open files.

homepage.introduction1: This app will help you type your translations faster.
homepage.introduction2: By skipping the 'copy-paste' step and other unnecessary steps.
homepage.guide2: Or just drag your translations here

settings.cacheCapHint: Maximum number of translations can be cached. If this limit is exceeded, the oldest cached translation will be removed. Minimum size: 1. Maximum size: 128. Require restart to take effect
settings.cacheTtlHint: Translations can remain cached for a maximum duration. They will be removed once they exceed this time limit. Minimum TTL: 1 minutes. Maximum TTL: 30 minutes. Require restart to take effect
settings.detectPaginationHint: The prefix used to identify pagination in translations
